name: Midnight Shadow
detailDescription: Experience unparalleled sound quality with our latest headphones, designed for true audiophiles.
Immerse yourself in rich, crystal-clear audio that brings your favorite music to life like never before.

name: Sunset Glow
description: Warm tones for golden hour vibes
detailDescription: Dive into the soothing embrace of warm, balanced tones that elevate every note.
Crafted for those who appreciate the finer details in their favorite tracks.

name: Arctic Frost
detailDescription: Precision-engineered for audiophiles who demand perfection in every frequency.
Experience pristine clarity that reveals every subtle detail in your music.

name: Mocha Blend
description: Rich earthy tones for chill beats
detailDescription: Rich, organic soundscapes designed for those laid-back listening sessions.
Let the smooth, earthy tones envelop you in pure acoustic comfort.

name: Rose Petal
detailDescription: Soft, nuanced audio that brings out the beauty in every melody.
Perfect for those intimate listening moments when every note matters.

name: Seafoam Dream
detailDescription: Serene soundscapes that transport you to calm, peaceful places.
Let the cool, flowing tones wash over you like gentle ocean waves.
